member_organisations: As of December 2017 Which? had 714,643 as reported in our annual report.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: Which? engages on a broad range of issues including financial services, energy, food safety, telecommunications and consumer rights.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholder consultation group for the Fitness Check of EU consumer and marketing law #E03423#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3423#Member#C
membership: Which? is a member of the European Consumers' Association (BEUC) and Consumers International (CI). Which? is also active in the Transatlantic Consumer Dialogue (TACD). We conduct some of our product testing through International Consumer Research & Testing (ICRT).
goals__remit:
Goals / remit of your organisation: 
Which? is an independent, not-for-profit consumer organisation. Which? has more than 1 million member and supporters and is the largest independent consumer membership organisation in the UK. Independent of government and industry, Which? is funded through its successful commercial businesses. Which? is a consumer champion working to make things better for consumers. Our campaigns make people's lives fairer, simpler and safer. 
 
Which? exists to make individuals as powerful as the organisations they have to deal with in their daily lives. We campaign for all UK consumers to help them get a fairer deal. We currently focus on energy, personal finance, food and other consumer markets.
relevant_communication: Which? publishes position papers on proposals of interest.
legal_status: Charity and a company limited by guarantee
